txt.en: 'You have done much for us, and now I am sure you are eager to press on into the tunnels.\n\n'Túbi Thickfist is at the top of the great stair just yonder, and I believe some dwarves under his supervision have already begun to press forward! If you are interested in doing the same, Túbi might have information that would be helpful for your journey.'

'Ah, I am glad someone with some skill as a warrior has come. I am afraid this tunnel quite unnerves me, [placeholder].\n\n'Some dwarves have already gone forth under my supervision, but they have not yet returned.'
'You can find Túbi atop the stairs, [placeholder].'
It is time to press forward into Moria from the safety of Durin's Threshold.
Find Túbi Thickfist at the top of the Stair
Túbi Thickfist is atop the great stairway of Durin's Threshold.\n\nYou should climb the stairs and find Túbi Thickfist.
